column1: Table 5-6:  CH4 and N2O Emissions from Manure Management (MMT CO2 Eq.)

column2: + Does not exceed 0.05 MMT CO2 Eq.
a Accounts for CH4 reductions due to capture and destruction of CH4 at facilities using anaerobic digesters.
b Includes both direct and indirect N2O emissions.
Notes: Totals may not sum due to independent rounding. American bison are maintained entirely on unmanaged WMS; there are no American bison N2O emissions from managed systems.
